hypothesis_content.title: BTC Weekend Volatility Compression Breakout
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades within a ±1.5% range during the Saturday 00:00-12:00 UTC window (lowest typical volume period) after a NEUTRAL regime week, a breakout in either direction exceeding ±2.5% from the range midpoint within the next 6 hours will continue in that direction for a further ±1.8-2.2% move before the Sunday 12:00 UTC close.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend liquidity droughts amplify genuine order flow. Compression during lowest-volume window indicates accumulation/distribution. False breakouts less common when volatility has been suppressed for precise 12h window.
entry_conditions: BTC 4h close variance < 0.000225 (1.5% annualized) over last 24h
Saturday 00:00-12:00 UTC: price remains within ±1.5% of opening price
Breakout: price moves ±2.5% beyond range midpoint

exit_conditions.take_profit: +1.8% from breakout confirmation (4h close beyond threshold)
